ability.Apex Predator: Increases attack and speed stats by 50% if the opponent is below 50% HP.
ability.Titan Bite: If this Pokemon uses a biting move, it has a 42% chance to flinch the target.

Rend.effect: The user recovers 30% the HP lost by the target.

Devastating Roar.effect: Lowers the Attack and Special Attack of all targets by 1 stage.

Tail Smash.effect: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.

Ice Fang.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
